entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Patent P.R. move in a cynical attempt to deflect from Trump's horrendous mishandling of the Covid-19 crisis: initially downplaying seriousness; ignoring & muzzling epidemiologists; blame-gaming everyone in sight (China, Dems, WHO); threatening to disband Corona Task Force; etc.
